MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA10 postcode area of Troon, affecting properties in Church Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.19pm. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Portland Street substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.55pm on Saturday 27th February 2021.
